00030   class DAQconnection : public UTIL::LCFixedObject<2, 0, 0> {
00031   public:
00034     DAQconnection( const unsigned int crate, const unsigned slot, const unsigned int fe, const unsigned int chip, const unsigned int channel, const std::string enc = defaultEncodingString ):encodingString(enc),bitField(enc){
00035       setCrate(crate);
00036       setSlot(slot);
00037       setFe(fe);
00038       setChip(chip);
00039       setChannel(channel);
00040     }
00041     
00044     DAQconnection( EVENT::LCObject* object, const std::string enc = defaultEncodingString) : UTIL::LCFixedObject<2,0,0>( object ),encodingString(enc),bitField(enc){
00045       lcio::long64 value;
00046       value = ( obj()->getIntVal(0) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
00047       value = (value << 32) | (obj()->getIntVal(1) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
00048       bitField.setValue(value);
00049     }
00050 
00053     ~DAQconnection(){
00054     }
00055

00058     void setFe(unsigned int fe);
00059     void setSlot(unsigned int slot);
00060     void setCrate(unsigned int crate);

00071     const std::string getDataDescription() const;
